short_description: 【Super Compatible 2 in 1 Wireless Charger】This dual wireless charging pad is designed to charge two devices (phones or earbuds that support wireless charging) at the same time. Even better, the wireless charger pad offers 3 charging collections: Simply juice up 2 phones/ 2 earbuds/ 1 phone+1 earbuds at once as you wish. Just place your devices on the phone charger pad, and let the power flow in no time!

【Super Thin & Lightweight:】Tinier body, bigger space! With the thickness of 0.3in and weight of 0.25lbs, this wireless charging pad is almost the same size as your phone, hardly occupying any space on your desktop. To provide maximum portability on the road, this wireless charger is slim and lightweight enough to fit perfectly in any handbag, backpack or suitcase.

【Ultimate Safety & Anti-Slip Silicone Pads】Your safety is our priority! Backed by CE, FCC and RoHS certifications, this wireless charger pad provides over-temp, over-charge, over-current, over-voltage protection and foreign object detection to ensure overall safety. Better still, equipped with non-slip silicone pads at its bottom, this wireless charger ensures a more stable charging experience.

【Sleep Friendly & Case Friendly】Find your ideal bedside charger here! When the dual wireless charger is connected to power, the indicator light will be on for 20s and then auto turn dark so as not to disturb your sleep. Better still, this wireless charger pad supports charging with most phone cases up to 5mm/0.2in thick (Note: Magnetic, metal attachments and other foreign objects will interfere with charging).

【What You'll Get】Enjoy worry-free charging with TAMOXI products! You will get 1x Wireless Charging Pad, 1x QC 3.0 24W Power Adapter, 1x 3.3ft Type-C Charging Cable, 1x User Manual and a 24-month Warranty.
